text: Buguruslanovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Maximovksky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 233 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 42 km from Sterlitamak, 8 km from Maximovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Buguruslanovka
